metadata.description: The unique guid for this workbook instance

parameters.name: InternalWSs
parameters.query:
SecurityIncident
| take 1
| parse IncidentUrl with * "/workspaces/" Workspace "/" *
| project Workspace

parameters.name: Subscription
parameters.query:
Resources
| summarize Count = count() by subscriptionId
| order by Count desc
| extend Rank = row_number()
| project value = subscriptionId, label = subscriptionId, selected = Rank == 1

parameters.name: Workspace
Severity
parameters.query:
SecurityIncident
| summarize Count = count(IncidentNumber) by Severity
| project Value = Severity, Label = strcat(Severity, ": ", Count)

parameters.name: Tactics
parameters.query:
SecurityIncident
| extend Tactics = todynamic(AdditionalData.tactics)
| mvexpand Tactics to typeof(string)
| summarize Count=count(IncidentNumber) by Tactics
| project Value = Tactics, Label = strcat(Tactics, ": ", Count)

parameters.name: Owner
parameters.query:
SecurityIncident
| extend owner = tostring(Owner.assignedTo) 
| summarize Count=count(IncidentNumber) by Owner= case(owner=="", "Unassigned",owner)
| project Value = Owner, Label = strcat(Owner, ": ", Count)

parameters.name: Product
parameters.label: Product Name
parameters.query:
SecurityIncident
| extend Product = tostring(parse_json(tostring(AdditionalData.alertProductNames))[0]) 
| summarize Count=count(IncidentNumber) by Product
| project Value = Product, Label = strcat(Product, ": ", Count)

content.query:
SecurityIncident 
| where CreatedTime >= {TimeRange:start} and CreatedTime <= {TimeRange:end}
| summarize arg_max(TimeGenerated, Status, Severity, Owner, AdditionalData,CreatedTime) by IncidentNumber
| where Severity in ({Severity}) or "*" in ({Severity})
| extend Tactics = todynamic(AdditionalData.tactics)
| extend Owner = todynamic(Owner.assignedTo) 
| where Owner in ({Owner}) or "*" in ({Owner})
| extend Product = todynamic((parse_json(tostring(AdditionalData.alertProductNames))[0])) 
| where Product in ({Product}) or "*" in ({Product})
| summarize count() by bin(CreatedTime, 1h)

SecurityIncident
| where CreatedTime >= {TimeBrush:start} and CreatedTime <= {TimeBrush:end}
| where Status == 'Closed'
| where Severity in ({Severity}) or "*" in ({Severity})
| extend Tactics = todynamic(AdditionalData.tactics)
| where Tactics in ({Tactics}) or "*" in ({Tactics})
| extend Owner = todynamic(Owner.assignedTo) 
| where Owner in ({Owner}) or "*" in ({Owner})
| extend Product = todynamic((parse_json(tostring(AdditionalData.alertProductNames))[0])) 
| where Product in ({Product}) or "*" in ({Product})
| extend feedback =strcat(Classification," ",ClassificationReason)
| summarize dcount(IncidentNumber) by feedback

SecurityIncident 
| where CreatedTime >= {TimeRange:start} and CreatedTime <= {TimeRange:end}
| summarize arg_max(TimeGenerated,Status, Severity, Owner, AdditionalData) by IncidentNumber
| where Severity in ({Severity}) or "*" in ({Severity})
| extend Tactics = todynamic(AdditionalData.tactics)
| where Tactics in ({Tactics}) or "*" in ({Tactics})
| extend Owner = todynamic(Owner.assignedTo) 
| where Owner in ({Owner}) or "*" in ({Owner})
| extend Product = todynamic((parse_json(tostring(AdditionalData.alertProductNames))[0])) 
| where Product in ({Product}) or "*" in ({Product})
| summarize dcount(IncidentNumber) by Severity
content.title: Incidents created by severity

content.query:
SecurityIncident
| where CreatedTime >= {TimeRange:start} and CreatedTime <= {TimeRange:end}
| summarize arg_max(TimeGenerated, Status, Severity, Owner, AdditionalData) by IncidentNumber
| where Severity in ({Severity}) or "*" in ({Severity})
| extend Tactics = todynamic(AdditionalData.tactics)
| where Tactics in ({Tactics}) or "*" in ({Tactics})
| extend Owner = todynamic(Owner.assignedTo) 
| where Owner in ({Owner}) or "*" in ({Owner})
| extend Product = todynamic((parse_json(tostring(AdditionalData.alertProductNames))[0])) 
| where Product in ({Product}) or "*" in ({Product})
| summarize count() by case(tostring(Owner)=="", "Unassigned",tostring(Owner))
content.title: Incidents created by owner

content.query:
SecurityIncident
| where CreatedTime >= {TimeRange:start} and CreatedTime <= {TimeRange:end}
| summarize arg_max(TimeGenerated, Status, Severity, Owner, AdditionalData) by IncidentNumber
| where Severity in ({Severity}) or "*" in ({Severity})
| extend Tactics = todynamic(AdditionalData.tactics)
| where Tactics in ({Tactics}) or "*" in ({Tactics})
| extend Owner = todynamic(Owner.assignedTo) 
| where Owner in ({Owner}) or "*" in ({Owner})
| extend Product = todynamic((parse_json(tostring(AdditionalData.alertProductNames))[0])) 
| where Product in ({Product}) or "*" in ({Product})
| summarize count() by Status
content.title: Incidents created by status

content.json: Time to detect, is the time between the incident creation and its first update.
Time to closure, is the time between the incident creation and its last closure.

content.query:
SecurityIncident
| where FirstModifiedTime  >= {TimeRange:start} and FirstModifiedTime  <= {TimeRange:end}
| where Severity in ({Severity}) or "*" in ({Severity})
| extend Tactics = todynamic(AdditionalData.tactics)
| where Tactics in ({Tactics}) or "*" in ({Tactics})
| extend Owner = todynamic(Owner.assignedTo) 
| where Owner in ({Owner}) or "*" in ({Owner})
| extend Product = todynamic((parse_json(tostring(AdditionalData.alertProductNames))[0])) 
| where Product in ({Product}) or "*" in ({Product})
| summarize arg_max(LastModifiedTime,*) by IncidentNumber 
| extend TimeToDetect =  (FirstModifiedTime - CreatedTime)/1h
| summarize 50th_Percentile=percentile(TimeToDetect, 50)
content.title: Mean time to detect (MTTD)

content.query:
SecurityIncident
| where ClosedTime >= {TimeRange:start} and ClosedTime <= {TimeRange:end}
| where Severity in ({Severity}) or "*" in ({Severity})
| extend Tactics = todynamic(AdditionalData.tactics)
| where Tactics in ({Tactics}) or "*" in ({Tactics})
| extend Owner = todynamic(Owner.assignedTo) 
| where Owner in ({Owner}) or "*" in ({Owner})
| extend Product = todynamic((parse_json(tostring(AdditionalData.alertProductNames))[0])) 
| where Product in ({Product}) or "*" in ({Product})
| summarize arg_max(TimeGenerated,*) by IncidentNumber 
| extend TimeToClosure =  (ClosedTime - CreatedTime)/1h
| summarize 50th_Percentile=percentile(TimeToClosure, 50)
content.title: Mean time to resolve (MTTR)

parameters.name: AlertSeverity
parameters.query:
SecurityAlert
| summarize Count = count() by AlertSeverity
| order by Count desc, AlertSeverity asc
| project Value = AlertSeverity, Label = strcat(AlertSeverity, ' - ', Count)

parameters.name: ProductName
parameters.query:
SecurityAlert
| summarize Count = count() by ProductName
| order by Count desc, ProductName asc
| project Value = ProductName, Label = strcat(ProductName, ' - ', Count)

content.query:
let data = SecurityAlert
| where "{AlertSeverity:lable}" == "All" or AlertSeverity in ({AlertSeverity})
| where "{ProductName:lable}" == "All" or ProductName in ({ProductName});
data
| summarize Count = count() by AlertSeverity
| join kind = inner (data
 | make-series Trend = count() default = 0 on TimeGenerated from {TimeRange:start} to {TimeRange:end} step {TimeRange:grain} by AlertSeverity)
 on AlertSeverity
 | project-away TimeGenerated
| extend AlertSeveritys = AlertSeverity
| union (
 data 
 | summarize Count = count() 
 | extend jkey = 1
 | join kind=inner (data
 | make-series Trend = count() default = 0 on TimeGenerated from {TimeRange:start} to {TimeRange:end} step {TimeRange:grain}
 | extend jkey = 1) on jkey
 | extend AlertSeverity = 'All', AlertSeveritys = '*' 
)
| extend Severity = iif(AlertSeverity == "All", 0,iif(AlertSeverity == "High", 1, iif(AlertSeverity == "Medium", 2, iif(AlertSeverity == "Low", 3, 4))))
| order by Severity asc
content.title: Security Alerts by Severity

content.query:
let data = SecurityAlert
| where "{AlertSeverity:lable}" == "All" or AlertSeverity in ({AlertSeverity})
| where "{ProductName:lable}" == "All" or ProductName in ({ProductName})
| where AlertSeverity == '{AlertSeverityPicker}' or '{AlertSeverityPicker}' == "All";
data
| summarize Count = count() by ProductName
| join kind = inner (data
 | make-series Trend = count() default = 0 on TimeGenerated from {TimeRange:start} to {TimeRange:end} step {TimeRange:grain} by ProductName)
 on ProductName
 | project-away TimeGenerated
| extend ProductNames = ProductName
| union (
 data 
 | summarize Count = count() 
 | extend jkey = 1
 | join kind=inner (data
 | make-series Trend = count() default = 0 on TimeGenerated from {TimeRange:start} to {TimeRange:end} step {TimeRange:grain}
 | extend jkey = 1) on jkey
 | extend ProductName = 'All', ProductNames = '*' 
)
| order by Count desc
content.title: Security Alerts by Product

content.query:
SecurityAlert
| where "{AlertSeverity:lable}" == "All" or AlertSeverity in ({AlertSeverity})
| where "{ProductName:lable}" == "All" or ProductName in ({ProductName})
| where AlertSeverity == '{AlertSeverityPicker}' or '{AlertSeverityPicker}' == "All"
| where ProductName == '{ProductNamePicker}' or '{ProductNamePicker}' == "All"
| summarize count() by AlertSeverity, bin(TimeGenerated, 1d)
content.title: Security Alerts Over Time by Severity

content.query:
SecurityAlert
| where "{AlertSeverity:lable}" == "All" or AlertSeverity in ({AlertSeverity})
| where "{ProductName:lable}" == "All" or ProductName in ({ProductName})
| where AlertSeverity == '{AlertSeverityPicker}' or '{AlertSeverityPicker}' == "All"
| where ProductName == '{ProductNamePicker}' or '{ProductNamePicker}' == "All"
| summarize count() by ProductName, bin(TimeGenerated, 1d)
content.title: Security Alerts Over Time by Product

content.query:
SecurityAlert
| where "{AlertSeverity:lable}" == "All" or AlertSeverity in ({AlertSeverity})
| where "{ProductName:lable}" == "All" or ProductName in ({ProductName})
| where AlertSeverity == '{AlertSeverityPicker}' or '{AlertSeverityPicker}' == "All"
| where ProductName == '{ProductNamePicker}' or '{ProductNamePicker}' == "All"
| extend Entities = iff(isempty(Entities), todynamic('[{"dummy" : ""}]'), todynamic(Entities))
| mvexpand Entities
| evaluate bag_unpack(Entities, "Entity_")
| extend Entity_Type = columnifexists("Entity_Type", "")
| extend Entity_Name = columnifexists("Entity_Name", "")
| extend Entity_ResourceId = columnifexists("Entity_ResourceId", "")
| extend Entity_Directory = columnifexists("Entity_Directory", "")
| extend Entity_Value = columnifexists("Entity_Value", "")
| extend Entity_HostName = columnifexists("Entity_HostName", "")
| extend Entity_Address = columnifexists("Entity_Address", "")
| extend Entity_ProcessId = columnifexists("Entity_ProcessId", "")
| extend Entity_Url = columnifexists("Entity_Url", "")
| extend Target = iif(Entity_Type == "account", Entity_Name, iif(Entity_Type == "azure-resource", Entity_ResourceId, iif(Entity_Type == "cloud-application", Entity_Name, iif(Entity_Type == "dns", Entity_Name, iif(Entity_Type == "file", strcat(Entity_Directory, "\\", Entity_Name), iif(Entity_Type == "filehash", Entity_Value, iif(Entity_Type == "host", Entity_HostName, iif(Entity_Type == "ip" , Entity_Address, iif(Entity_Type == "malware", Entity_HostName, iif(Entity_Type == "network-connection", Entity_Name, iif(Entity_Type == "process", Entity_ProcessId, iif(Entity_Type == "registry-key", Entity_Name, iif(Entity_Type == "registry-value", Entity_Name, iif(Entity_Type == "security-group", Entity_Name, iif(Entity_Type == "url", Entity_Url, "NoTarget")))))))))))))))
| where Entity_Type in ("account", "host", "ip", "url", "azure-resource", "cloud-application", "dns", "file", "filehash", "malware", "network-connection", "process", "registry-key", "registry-value", "security-group")
| summarize count() by bin(TimeGenerated, 1d), Target, Entity_Type
| project-away TimeGenerated
| order by count_ desc
content.title: Top Entities in Security Alerts

content.query:
SecurityAlert
| where "{AlertSeverity:lable}" == "All" or AlertSeverity in ({AlertSeverity})
| where "{ProductName:lable}" == "All" or ProductName in ({ProductName})
| where AlertSeverity == '{AlertSeverityPicker}' or '{AlertSeverityPicker}' == "All"
| where ProductName == '{ProductNamePicker}' or '{ProductNamePicker}' == "All"
| extend Entities = iff(isempty(Entities), todynamic('[{"dummy" : ""}]'), todynamic(Entities))
| mvexpand Entities
| evaluate bag_unpack(Entities, "Entity_")
| extend Entity_Type = columnifexists("Entity_Type", "")
| where Entity_Type in ("account", "alerts", "azure-resource", "cloud-application", "dns", "file", "filehash", "host", "host-logon-session", "ip", "malware", "network-connection", "process", "registry-key", "registry-value", "security-group", "SrvSvcSessionEntry", "url")
| summarize count() by Entity_Type
| order by count_ desc
content.title: Count of Entities in Security Alerts by Type

content.query:
let data = SecurityAlert
| where "{AlertSeverity:lable}" == "All" or AlertSeverity in ({AlertSeverity})
| where "{ProductName:lable}" == "All" or ProductName in ({ProductName});
data
| summarize Count = count() by AlertSeverity
| join kind = inner (data
 | make-series Trend = count() default = 0 on TimeGenerated from {TimeRange:start} to {TimeRange:end} step {TimeRange:grain} by AlertSeverity)
 on AlertSeverity
 | project-away TimeGenerated
| extend AlertSeveritys = AlertSeverity
| union (
 data 
 | summarize Count = count() 
 | extend jkey = 1
 | join kind=inner (data
 | make-series Trend = count() default = 0 on TimeGenerated from {TimeRange:start} to {TimeRange:end} step {TimeRange:grain}
 | extend jkey = 1) on jkey
 | extend AlertSeverity = 'All', AlertSeveritys = '*' 
)
| extend Severity = iif(AlertSeverity == "All", 0,iif(AlertSeverity == "High", 1, iif(AlertSeverity == "Medium", 2, iif(AlertSeverity == "Low", 3, 4))))
| order by Severity asc
content.title: Security Alerts by Severity

content.query:
union withsource= ['Table Name'] * 
| summarize LastEvent = max(TimeGenerated) by ['Table Name']
| extend State = iff(LastEvent < ago(2h), 'Not-Connected', 'Connected')
| extend TimeFromNow = now() - LastEvent
| summarize count () by State
content.title: Data Connector Status

content.query:
union withsource=_TableName1 *
| summarize count () by ['Table Name']=Type
| summarize sum(count_)
content.title: Log Ingested Count

content.query:
union withsource=_TableName *
//| where _TimeReceived > ago(1d)
| summarize count(), Size = sum(_BilledSize) by bin(_TimeReceived, 1m), Type, _IsBillable
| extend counttemp =count_ / 60
| summarize 
    ['Average Events per Second (eps)'] = avg(counttemp), ['Minimum eps']=min (counttemp),
    ['Maximum eps']=max(counttemp)
    by ['Table Name']=Type
| order by ['Average Events per Second (eps)'] desc| summarize sum(['Maximum eps'])
content.title: Maximum EPS Count

content.query:
union withsource=_TableName *
//| where _TimeReceived > ago(1d)
| summarize count(), Size = sum(_BilledSize) by bin(_TimeReceived, 1m), Type, _IsBillable
| extend counttemp =count_ / 60
| summarize 
    ['Average Events per Second (eps)'] = avg(counttemp), ['Minimum eps']=min (counttemp),
    ['Maximum eps']=max(counttemp)
    by ['Table Name']=Type
| order by ['Average Events per Second (eps)'] desc
| summarize sum(['Minimum eps'])
content.title: Minimum  EPS Count

content.query:
union withsource=_TableName *
//| where _TimeReceived > ago(1d)
| summarize count(), Size = sum(_BilledSize) by bin(_TimeReceived, 1m), Type, _IsBillable
| extend counttemp =count_ / 60
| summarize 
    ['Average Events per Second (eps)'] = avg(counttemp), ['Minimum eps']=min (counttemp),
    ['Maximum eps']=max(counttemp)
    by ['Table Name']=Type
| order by ['Average Events per Second (eps)'] desc
| summarize sum(['Average Events per Second (eps)'])
content.title: Average EPS Count

content.query:
union withsource= ['Table Name'] * 
//| distinct  ['Table Name']
| extend Type_01 = case(OfficeWorkload has "SharePoint","Office(SharePoint)",
 OfficeWorkload has "Exchange", "Office(Exchange)", OfficeWorkload has "OneDrive", "Office(OneDrive)", OfficeWorkload has "MicrosoftTeams", "Office(MicrosoftTeams)", "")
//| extend Type_02 = case(OfficeWorkload has "Azure Advanced Threat Protection","Azure Advanced Threat Protection", OfficeWorkload has "MDATP", "Microsoft Defender for Endpoint", OfficeWorkload has "OATP", "Microsoft Defender for Office 365 (Preview)", OfficeWorkload has "MCAS", "Microsoft Defender for Cloud Apps", "")
| extend Data_Connector = case(
Type has "AuditLogs", "Azure Active Directory(Audit_logs)",
Type has "SigninLogs", "Azure Active Directory(Sign_in)",
Type has "AzureActivity","Azure Activity",
Type has "SecurityEvents", "Security Events via Legacy Agent",
Type has "Syslog", "syslog",
Type has "DeviceRegistryEvents","Microsoft_365_defender(DeviceRegistryEvents)",
Type has "DeviceProcessEvents","Microsoft_365_defender(DeviceProcessEvents)",
Type has "DeviceNetworkInfo","Microsoft_365_defender(DeviceNetworkInfo)",
Type has "DeviceNetworkEvents","Microsoft_365_defender(DeviceNetworkEvents)",
Type has "DeviceLogonEvents","Microsoft_365_defender(DeviceLogonEvents)",
Type has "DeviceInfo","Microsoft_365_defender(DeviceInfo)",
Type has "DeviceImageLoadEvents","Microsoft_365_defender(DeviceImageLoadEvents)",
Type has "DeviceFileEvents","Microsoft_365_defender(DeviceFileEvents)",
Type has "DeviceEvents","Microsoft_365_defender(DeviceEvents)",
Type_01 has "Office(SharePoint)", "Office_365(SharePoint)",
Type_01 has "Office(Exchange)", "Office_365(Exchange)",
Type_01 has "Office(OneDrive)", "Office_365(OneDrive)",
Type_01 has "Office(MicrosoftTeams)", "Office_365(MicrosoftTeams)",
Type has "SecurtyAlert(ASC)", "Microsoft Defencer for Cloud",
 "empty")
| where Data_Connector !contains ("empty")
| summarize LastEvent = max(TimeGenerated) by Data_Connector
| extend State = iff(LastEvent < ago(12h), 'Not-Connected', 'Connected')
| extend TimeFromNow = now() - LastEvent
| summarize count () by State, Data_Connector
content.title: Devices Reporting to Sentinel

content.query:
SecurityIncident
//| where CreatedTime between (datetime(2021-12-11 00:00:00) .. datetime(2021-12-13 23:59:59))
| where Status contains "Closed"
| extend FMT = iff(isnotempty(FirstModifiedTime),FirstModifiedTime,CreatedTime)
| summarize Created_Time = min(CreatedTime), FirstModificationTime = min(FirstModifiedTime) by IncidentNumber,Title
| extend FirstModifiedTime = iff(isnotempty(FirstModificationTime),FirstModificationTime,Created_Time)
| extend MTTD = FirstModificationTime-Created_Time
| extend MTTD = datetime_diff("minute",FirstModificationTime,Created_Time)
| extend CreatedDay = datetime_part("Day", Created_Time)
| extend CreatedMonth = datetime_part("Month", Created_Time)
| extend CreatedYear = datetime_part("Year", Created_Time)
| extend CreatedDate = strcat(CreatedDay,"/",CreatedMonth,"/",CreatedYear)
| project Created_Time,FirstModifiedTime,MTTD, CreatedDate
| order by Created_Time, MTTD desc
content.title: Data Connector Health Status

content.query:
Heartbeat
| where TimeGenerated > ago(1d)
| summarize LastHeartbeat = max(TimeGenerated) by Computer, OSType, ComputerEnvironment
| extend State = iff(LastHeartbeat < ago(1h), 'Unhealthy', 'Healthy')
| extend TimeFromNow = now() - LastHeartbeat
| extend ["TimeAgo"] = strcat(' ',(strcat(case(TimeFromNow < 1m, strcat(toint(TimeFromNow / 1m), ' seconds'), TimeFromNow < 1h, strcat(toint(TimeFromNow / 1m), ' minutes'), TimeFromNow < 1d, strcat(toint(TimeFromNow / 1h), ' hours'), strcat(toint(TimeFromNow / 1d), ' days')), ' ago')))
| project ["Computer"]=strcat(' ', Computer),OSType, State,ComputerEnvironment,TimeAgo,TimeFromNow,LastHeartbeat
| summarize count() by State, OSType
content.title: Device Reporting to Sentinel By Type

content.query:
Heartbeat
| where TimeGenerated > ago(1d)
| summarize LastHeartbeat = max(TimeGenerated) by Computer, OSType, ComputerEnvironment
| extend State = iff(LastHeartbeat < ago(1h), 'Unhealthy', 'Healthy')
| extend TimeFromNow = now() - LastHeartbeat
| extend ["TimeAgo"] = strcat(' ',(strcat(case(TimeFromNow < 1m, strcat(toint(TimeFromNow / 1m), ' seconds'), TimeFromNow < 1h, strcat(toint(TimeFromNow / 1m), ' minutes'), TimeFromNow < 1d, strcat(toint(TimeFromNow / 1h), ' hours'), strcat(toint(TimeFromNow / 1d), ' days')), ' ago')))
| project ["Computer"]=strcat(' ', Computer),OSType, State,ComputerEnvironment,TimeAgo,TimeFromNow,LastHeartbeat
| summarize count() by State, OSType
content.title: Count of Device by Type

content.query:
union withsource=_TableName *
| summarize Count=count() by _TableName
| render barchart
